sentences.sContent: This variety is said to have a dog or panther-like nose and face, a forked tongue protruding from it, large fangs, and to hiss and screech when alarmed, as well as leave a sulfuric stench behind.
sentences.sContent_eng: This variety is said to have a dog or panther-like nose and face, a forked tongue protruding from it, large fangs, and to hiss and screech when alarmed, as well as leave a sulfuric stench behind.
sentences.sCn: 据说，它还拥有狗或是豹子一样的鼻子和脸，像叉子一样的舌头，很大的獠牙，被惊吓到时会嘶嘶作声并尖叫并放出含有大量硫磺的臭气。

synos.tran: 硫磺的；含多量硫磺的；含（六价）硫的

trans.tranCn: 硫磺的；含多量硫磺的；含（六价）硫的
